ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(RecordType.DeveloperName == 'HWS_Case_Escalation', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'HWS_Parent_Case', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'HWS_Case_Escalation', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'HWS_Parent_Case_Ready_Only', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'HWS_Return_For_Repair', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'HWS_Spare_Part_Sales', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'HWS_Spare_Part_Sales_Read_only', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'HWS_Advance_Exchange_In_Days', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'HWS_Child_Case_Read_Only', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'HWS_Advance_Exchange_In_Hours'), AND( NOT(ISBLANK( HWS_FaultyUnitReceivedDate__c )) , OR( ISCHANGED( HWS_FaultyUnitAWBNumber__c ) , ISCHANGED( HWS_FaultyUnitShipmentDispatchDate__c ) ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot be set or modified after faulty unit is received
